DataElement.preferredName: Pulse Rate Maximum Estimate Value Measurement
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numerical response regarding the estimated/predicted maximum heart rate of a patient.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The rate of the pulse as observed in an artery, expressed as beats per minute. It can be measured at several anatomical sites, including the wrist, neck, temple, groin, behind the knees, or on top of the foot._the largest possible quantity or degree._To calculate approximately._The largest possible quantity or degree._A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The rate of the pulse as observed in an artery, expressed as beats per minute. It can be measured at several anatomical sites, including the wrist, neck, temple, groin, behind the knees, or on top of the foot.

Concepts.definition: The rate of the pulse as observed in an artery, expressed as beats per minute. It can be measured at several anatomic sites, including the wrist, neck, temple, groin, behind the knees, or on top of the foot.

Property.preferredDefinition: the largest possible quantity or degree.:To calculate approximately.:A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: The largest possible quantity or degree.
A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The size or magnitude of rhythmic wave within the arteries occurring with each contraction of the left ventricle. [Manually-curated]

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The rhythmic wave within the arteries occurring with each contraction of the left ventricle. (NCI):Measurement; the size or magnitude of something.

Concepts.definition: The rhythmic wave within the arteries occurring with each contraction of the left ventricle.
Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 10/13/2015 removed upside down question mark from change note. jk 2/10/12 FBPP content retired per Jenny Larkin (NHLBI); VD reused by CDEs in multiple other contexts and kept released.  7/18/08 - updated max/min len; hig/low values with actuals based on FBPP and C3D data.  9/26/07  Released VD.
